com.mlt.desktop

Class LookupRecords

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.LookupRecords

  • public class LookupRecords
extends java.lang.Object
    Lookup records from a recordset or a list of records in a modal dialog.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
